## Part 1: Introduction



```{r}
env_vars <- read_csv(here("data", "world_env_vars.csv")) %>% 
  drop_na(cropland_cover,tree_canopy_cover,rain_mean_annual,temp_annual_range)

pca_env_vars <- env_vars %>% 
 # filter(Country %in% 
          # c("United States of America","Canada","Mexico")) %>% 
  select(cropland_cover,tree_canopy_cover,rain_mean_annual,temp_annual_range) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  scale() %>% 
  prcomp()
```
```{r}
autoplot(pca_env_vars, data = env_vars,
         loadings = TRUE,
         loadings.label = TRUE,
         loadings.colour = "black",
         loadings.label.colour = "black",
         loadings.label.vjust = -0.5)+
  theme_minimal()

#screeplot(pca_env_vars, type = "lines")

```
